wizards.title: Welcome to Farmmit
wizards.description: Welcome to Farmmit v.1.0 farmer edition. Connecting the dots between work and workmen.

wizards.title: For Farmers
wizards.description: Help farmers to arrange labours at the required time.

wizards.description: Help unbounded labourers to manage their daily living.

wizards.title: Direct Communication
wizards.description: It is a social app which does not have 3rd party involvement

wizards.title: Simple & Easy
wizards.description: Supportive UI, easy to use and understand
Sorry, the text was so fast, so you didn't see it. That's how it works. We are proud of the truth that this app can handle user's everyday task.
